base.words: she watches tv
she has a cat
She always does it on time
She goes to school
He does it every day
He misses you
She sometimes goes to the cinema
He sometimes plays computer games
base.translate: Он иногда играет в компьютерные игры

base.words: She feels so happy
She has an interesting idea
He sometimes wants to do it
He tries to do it
Our mother thinks the same
Their ideas seem so interesting
My friend supports me
My teacher usually comes to work on time
base.translate: Мой учитель обычно приходит на работу вовремя

base.words: My father usually comes home late
base.translate: Мой отец обычно приходит домой поздно

base.words: Her brother often says it
My parents want to do it
My sister studies there
Their offer seems really strange
My parents want to live in another place
base.translate: Мои родителя хотят жить в другом месте

base.words: I'd like to drink a cap of tea
base.translate: Я хотел бы выпить чашку чая

base.words: She'd like to become a teacher
She likes this place
I also like this channel
He'd like to read this book
base.translate: Ему хотелось бы прочитать эту книгу

base.words: I really like these lessons
She'd like to go to another place
base.translate: Ей хотелось бы поехать в другое место

base.words: I don't want to tell you about this problem
base.translate: Я не хочу говорить с вами об этой проблеме

base.words: It doesn't help me
My brother doesn't want to think about his future
base.translate: Мой брат не хочет думать о своем будущем

base.words: His son doesn't want to become a doctor
base.translate: Его сын не хочет становится врачем

base.words: This person doesn't try to change his life
base.translate: Этот человек не пытается изменить свою жизнь

base.words: My friend and I don't call them
base.translate: Я со своим другом не звоним им

base.words: Our teacher doesn't believe us
He thinks money doesn't bring poeple happyiness
base.translate: Он думает, деньги не приносят людям счастья

base.words: She needs to correct these mistakes
He needs to find a good job
You need to remember this rule
I need to speak English without any mistakes at all
base.translate: Мне нужно говорить по английски совсем без каких-либо ошибок

base.words: I need your advice
Your mother needs to work less
Our teachers don't explain it
Do you work for you mistakes?
Do you support this decision?
Do you need to solve this problem right now?
base.translate: Тебе нужно решить эту проблему прямо сейчас?

base.words: Do you often listen to music?
Do you have enough practice?
Do we have enough knowledge?
